thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: Kyle Korver

author: Kyle Korver
title: Kyle Korver
text: For over 4 years I have been a customer of esurranty and I can tell you that I was about to not renew because I never had a claim. Low and behold I dropped my tablet while hiking the Red Rock 3 weeks ago and it was toast. I logged into my account from my phone, filed a claim and about an hour later I received an email from Sean giving me options for repair. When I told him it was at the bottom of the mountain, he asked me to send in some forms when i got back to my hotel and 2 days later a new tablet was delivered to my hotel. Now that's service!
